error.empty_response: No charging stations found. Please check form input and try again. Either invalid SERIAL-NUMBER or no data found for it.
error.login_failed: Login failed, please verify email and password are correct.
error.missing_data: Please provide either a serial number or email and password.

data.origin: Origin eg: 51.330436, 3.802043 or person.fred or zone.home or street, city, country
data.only_eneco: Only show Eneco card supported stations

find_nearest.name: Find the nearest EV Charging Station
find_nearest.description: Find the EV Charging Station nearest to a given location and meeting specific criteria.

origin.name: Origin
origin.description: Origin eg 51.330436, 3.802043 or person.fred or zone.home or street, city, country

only_eneco.name: Only Eneco
only_eneco.description: Only show Eneco card supported station, default false

min_power.name: Minimum power
min_power.description: Minimum power in kW, eg 50, default 0

available.name: Only available station
available.description: Only get a currently available station, default false
